arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lens 3-1 Brest: Les Sang et Or run riot after Radoslaw Majecki sees red
arts.sum: Ligue McDonald’s, Gameweek 3, 29/08/25 Stade Brestois travelled to the Stade Bollaert-Delelis in search of their first win of the season, while their hosts RC Lens secured theirs away to…

arts.ttl: Lens reach agreement with Brighton for Abdallah Sima
arts.sum: According to a report from Foot Mercato, RC Lens have reached an agreement with Brighton & Hove Albion for Abdallah Sima (24). Lens had accelerated their interest in the forward,…
